videos.title: FNLD GRVL: Where is Lahti, Finland?
videos.description:
Where in the world is Lahti, Finland? If you've ridden there, then you you know. If not, then it's time to go. Join us right here on June 10th for Europe's newest gravel cycling race. From the team behind SBT GRVL and F1 legend Valtteri Bottas and women's champ ; welcome to FNLD GRVL. 

https://www.fnldgrvl.com

videos.title: Welcome to FNLD GRVL
videos.description:
Join us June 10th 2023 in Lahti Finland. A brainchild of Formula 1 driver Valtteri Bottas and SBT GRVL, the event will feature three course distances with a 20k Euro prize purse and 1500 riders from around the world.  

Registration opens November 15th and is expected to sell out quickly.



#finland #fnldgrvl 
#finlandgravel #valtteribottas 
 #gravelrace #gravelbike

videos.title: Lahti Harbor: Starting Line for FNLD GRVL
videos.description: It’s hard to believe it right now in the dead of winter, but this icy harbor in downtown Lahti will soon thaw and come alive this June. Hundreds of riders from around the world will line up right here for the start of FNLD GRVL. Racers won’t have to worry about burning daylight as the sun will not set here until 10:49 pm on June tenth. This is great news for the night owls, because we’ll be partying late into the evening with music, awards, and of course, plenty of food and beer.

videos.title: FNLD GRVL Course Preview: Lahti Sports Centre
videos.description: More course previews are on the way! Let's start at the Lahti Sports Center, the site of our Race Expo, launch point for many of our weekend actives, and the finish line for FNLD GRVL. World famous for its massive ski jumps, these towers will serve as beacons to riders as they make their way back into town.
videos.transcript:

Finish Line let's take a closer look

videos.title: FNLD GRVL Race Weekend Recap
videos.description:
The first edition of FNLD GRVL is officially in the books, and what a weekend it was. From shakeout rides with Valtteri Bottas and Tiffany Cromwell, to rides with Castelli, Canyon, Strava and Zipp, to a non-traditional pro panel featuring some of the biggest names in cycling we packed a ton into three days; and, that was all before we even rolled up to the starting line. On Saturday, June 10th nearly 1,000 gravel cyclists from around the world lined up in downtown Lahti, Finland, and we sent them off into the countryside and along three distances (177k, 77k, and 40k) through the pristine gravel roads of Finnish Lakeland. That night we brought it all to a close in typical GRVL fashion under the midnight sun in the Lahti harbor with awards, concert, DJ, and and afterparty complete with sauna and hot tubs. Catch our full day-by-day recap right here, and keep your eye out for 2024 registration dates and info. 



#gravelrace #gravelcycling #valtteribottas #finland #visitfinland #lahti
